data.text: @willemhuman told me that he wants to know if all of the above issues, EH_5 is still required in CC? @shaunviljoen, @gillianoberholzer, @brendaengelbrecht and @hariettelesch please can you go through the document and confirm? It's been a while since they were requested and might be different now, or completely nullified. You can also add more if you'd like since more frustrations might have emerged.
